==Japanese==

===Kanji===
{{ja-kanji|rs=魚05}}

====Readings====
{{ja-readings
|goon=[[しょう]] (shō)
|kanon=[[せい]] (sei)
|kun=[[なまぐさい]] ([[鮏い]], namagusai) {{qualifier|rare}}, [[なまぐさ]] (namagusa) {{qualifier|rare}}, [[さけ]] (sake), [[しゃけ]] (sake)
}}

===Etymology===
{{ja-kanjitab|さけ|yomi=k}}
Originally a {{bor|nocap=1|ja|ain|サㇰイベ|tr=sak ibe||salmon|pos=literally “summer + eat”, in reference to how the fish would be caught and eaten in the summer}}, or possible alternative unattested compound {{m|ain|サㇰ}}{{m|ain|エㇷ゚|tr=sak ep|lit=summer + food}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|さけ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR,SMK5}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|鮭}} {{qualifier|most common}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|さけ}}

# {{alternative spelling of|lang=ja|鮭}}: {{l|en|salmon}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|しゃけ|yomi=k}}
Originally a {{bor|nocap=1|ja|ain|シャケンベ|tr=shakembe}}<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>, apparently as a dialectal variation or corruption of {{cog|ain|サㇰイベ|tr=sak ibe||salmon|lit=summer + eat}}, or of possible alternative unattested compound {{m|ain|サㇰ}}{{m|ain|エㇷ゚|tr=sak ep|lit=summer + food}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|しゃけ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR,SMK5}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|鮭}} {{qualifier|most common}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|しゃけ}}

# {{alternative spelling of|lang=ja|鮭}}: {{l|en|salmon}}

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|なまぐさ}}
Root stem of adjective {{m|ja|生臭い}}, {{m|ja|腥い|tr=namagusai||smelling of fish, meat, or blood; stinky, bad-smelling}},<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref> itself a compound of {{compound|ja|sort=なまぐさ|生|tr1=nama|t1=raw, uncooked|臭い|tr2=kusa|t2=stink, bad smell|pos2=root stem of {{m|ja|臭い}} ''kusai'', “stinky, bad-smelling”}}.  {{rendaku2|sort=なまぐさ|kusa|gusa}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|なまぐさ|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|生臭}} {{qualifier|most common}}, {{ja-l|腥}} {{qualifier|rare}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|なまぐさ}}

# a {{l|en|smell}} of {{l|en|fish}}, {{l|en|meat}}, or {{l|en|blood}}
# a {{l|en|stink}}, a bad {{l|en|smell}}
